entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 5:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.7°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain or snow this evening then to snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
